1447770.name: D100 Dungeon - The Adventurers Companion
1447770.description:
Book 2: The Adventurer's Companion is an essential guide for any adventurer wishing to spice up their games. It offers new rules and additions that can be implemented into your games, and contains a new way to play quests, with the introduction of a campaign quest line and side quests.​

THE ADD-ON CONTAINS

CAMPAIGN 1: THE GOBLIN AND THE GOBLET (NORTHREACH) - 20 campaign quest

SIDE QUESTS - 25 side quests in a new quest table QA.

FAST TRACK - Fast track your adventurers through the first 5 quests.

THE ENCOUNTER RULE - You won't have to keep fighting giant rats.

NEW MONSTERS WITH TABLE EA - New monsters on the encounter table EA.

NEW HERO PATHS WITH TABLE HA - New hero paths to explore.

NEW HERO RACES WITH TABLE RA - New hero races to try out.

NEW MONSTER ABILITIES - With the new monsters comes all of their new abilities.

WITCHERY RULES - Rules to create something amazing from all the monster parts.

QUEST MAKER - Make your own quests to play.

DEATH KILL - You will get a bonus when rolling on tables when you make a massive killing attack.

Note that it is necessary to purchase the pen and pencil version separately. The Companion does not provide any of the documentation that comes with the pen and pencil version.
